page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT OCCUPATIONS
page.content: {PARENTS'JOBS In our school we discussed the occupations of our parents.Our fathers are builders,teachers,aircraft technicians,farmers and barmen.Some are bank,business or factory managers. We have a dentist,a joiner and hospital and council workers.Some fathers are salesmen,auctioneers, foresters or car mechanics.Some mothers go out to work part-time or full-time.They are teachers,milk ladies,shopkeepers,cashiers,physio- therapists,hairdressers,secretaries, salesladies and gardeners.Most mothers are housewives especially those who have young children.Parents have to travel to the towns to work.They travel to Louth,Grimsby,Scunthorpe, Immingham,Mablethorpe and Skegness. Some parents are self-employed.Luckily no father is unemployed.
